content.question: Based on the data in the graph, which of the following values best indicates the change in the present-day <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration as compared to the <math alttext="C O 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration approximately <math alttext="200,000" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>200</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>000</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> years ago?

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
